JOB DESCRIPTION: Requirement       This role is suited to someone who is looking to kick-start a career in IT programming and development.     The successful candidate should have a distinct interest in software programming and development and some experience in writing software applications.     Knowledge of any software language and relational databases such as Microsoft SQL Server would be advantageous but not essential as full training will be given.     You should be focused, enthusiastic, motivated, and have a desire to progress and develop a career around this new role.     Must be 2020 Graduate       Skills      Bachelors in Computer or IT related specialization   Excellent verbal communication skills   Demonstrable problem solving, analytical skills   Ability to program in any High-Level language like Java, C# etc   Knowledge of SQL, HTML/CSS desirable   Ability to stay current with new technology
